column2: an A.M. Eatery////Very disappointed in the service and food. Ordered something simple and requested eggs over medium
column3: they were Runny. Ordered toast double toasted to ensure it would be toasted
column4: I don't think it was even put in a toaster. Â When we flagged down the hostess since we didn't see our waitress
column5: she said I'll get your server rather than take the muffin to the back to get toasted. Wanted to try out a new place for something different but won't be coming back !!
